articles.title: A Chinese phone company made a cheap Ferrari EV. Who needs Porsche?
articles.author: Chris Bryant
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched its new luxury electric sport utility vehicle, the YU7. The YU7 is a stylish and tech-laden SUV with up to 835 kilometers of driving range, with the entry-level version costing 253,500 yuan ($54,000).

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked July 2025: The Ultra experience is ready to be revealed
articles.author: Criticologos
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will unveil the latest additions to the Galaxy portfolio at the Unpacked event in Brooklyn on July 9. The new Galaxy devices will feature an AI-powered interface and revolutionary hardware, signifying the introduction of new products and advancements in their technology.

articles.title: Red Rooster introduces new Cheeseburger with campaign from Leo Australia
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Red Rooster has launched a new Cheeseburger, supported by a marketing campaign targeting burger lovers. The Cheeseburger aims to attract new customers and win back lapsed fans with a familiar flavor and new twist and is available for a limited time from July 2nd at participating restaurants nationwide.

articles.title: Brandhead evolves: From media owner to full-service creative digital advertising agency
articles.summary: Brandhead is transforming from a media ownership business into a full-service creative digital advertising agency, offering creative, strategy, content, and digital media services. Its legacy media platforms and OOH business services are transitioning to Gida Media, which will provide innovative outdoor, mobile, and live streaming media solutions.

articles.title: Walmart Just Crashed Prime Day's Party With Its Biggest Summer Sale Yet
articles.summary: Walmart is launching a six-day summer savings event starting July 8, featuring discounts on various products. These include the 32-Inch Samsung Smart Monitor for $199, the 50-Inch Vizio QLED Smart TV for $218, the Dyson V7 Advanced Cordless Vacuum Cleaner for $229.99, the HART 40-Volt 21-inch Supercharge Mower Kit for $374, and the Ozark Trail Canopy Tent for $139.77.

articles.title: ‘Winner': Hungry Jack's releases a brand new dessert item
articles.author: Claudia Poposki
articles.summary: Hungry Jack's launched the Nutella Storm ice cream on July 1, featuring vanilla soft serve, Nutella, and wafer crumb. The company's Marketing Director, Luke Pavan, expresses confidence that customers will enjoy the combination of Nutella and soft serve, creating an irresistible product.

articles.title: Zeagoo Opens Early Access Prime Day Sale Featuring Seasonal Apparel Deals
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Zeagoo has officially launched its Prime Day event. The event unveils discounts ranging from 10% to 40% on a curated lineup of summer essentials.

articles.title: New Leadership Mindset: Why Staying In Your Lane Might Be A Big Risk
articles.author: Brent Gleeson
articles.summary: EXCELR8 is a new SaaS category focused on AI-driven decision intelligence across previously siloed performance, productivity, and collaboration tools. This AI-fueled platform empowers leadership teams to de-risk decisions and act on real-time insight. EXCELR8 leverages AI to help leaders identify hidden patterns, predict category demand, and test new offerings with precision.

articles.title: Gemini Logo: Google's New Design Explained
articles.summary: Google introduced a new logo for Gemini AI, designed to represent intelligence, connection, and the merging of concepts. The logo's introduction impacts Google's brand identity and signifies its presence in the AI field, visually associating with AI services like Gemini 2.5 Pro and future digital products.

articles.title: Google Gemini is set to become a significantly better phone assistant thanks to these two ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Google Gemini is introducing new app access options. These new options are presented as a positive development for users.

articles.title: GSA Equipment Introduces Daihatsu Mini Trucks to North American Market
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: GSA Equipment has launched Daihatsu mini trucks in North America, addressing the demand for versatile and fuel-efficient work vehicles. These compact utility vehicles offer features like four-wheel drive, impressive payload capacity, and exceptional fuel economy, targeting agricultural, landscaping, construction, and municipal sectors.

articles.title: Is the New Dyson Airwrap Worth $700?
articles.author: Jesa Marie Calaor
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the new Airwrap Coanda 2X in the US on July 8th. This new model features visible changes to its base, a more powerful Hyperdymium 2 motor, and updated attachments like the AirSmooth 2x, which straightens hair with less frizz. The Coanda 2X is lighter and aims to improve overall performance with faster drying and stronger airflow.

articles.title: Visa announces new payment solutions in the Philippines
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: Visa has unveiled new products designed to boost.

articles.title: Jardiland & Gamm Vert: Data Sharing & Terac Initiative
articles.summary: Teract is launching new digital tools to support its franchisees across brands like Gamm Vert, Jardiland, and Delbard. These tools are designed to enhance customer engagement and optimize media strategies. The initiative aims to empower franchisees, improve customer satisfaction, and drive sales by providing resources tailored to specific customer segments.

articles.title: UGG is dropping a new limited-edition color — and you can be the first to get it
articles.author: Dawn Magyar
articles.summary: UGG is launching a limited-edition Mustard Seed color for its Goldenstar Clog on July 2, priced at $130 and available exclusively to UGG Rewards members. The Goldenstar Clog features suede styling, a sugarcane EVA outsole, and can be worn with or without the strap. The Mustard Seed release also includes a kid's Goldenstar Clog style as well as the men's Goldencoast Clog II.

articles.title: Orangekloud Announces July 25 Launch of eMOBIQ® AI Platform  Jul. 1, 2025 20:30
articles.summary: Orangekloud Technology Inc. has officially launched eMOBIQ® AI, an enterprise-grade, AI-first no-code development platform, on July 01, 2025. This platform allows users to build scalable, intelligent applications through natural language input, automating critical stages of the application development lifecycle and deploying them across web and mobile platforms rapidly.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Day sale: Best deals and promo codes in Singapore 2025
articles.summary: Amazon is launching Prime Day deals from July 8-14 in Singapore, extending it to a seven-day event. Early deals are already available, including discounts on Amazon Fresh, Roborock vacuums, Smeg appliances, Philips appliances, Hasbro toys, and Learning Resources toys. Customers can also collect exclusive promo codes for extra savings during this event.

articles.title: Walmart just dropped an insane deal on the GE Profile nugget ice maker
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Walmart is offering a discount on the GE Profile Opal Nugget Ice Maker + Side Tank, pricing it at $391, down from its usual $550. This deal marks the lowest price seen for this product at Walmart, providing customers a substantial saving. The GE Profile Opal Nugget Ice Maker is known for its compact size, stylish design, and ability to store ice.

articles.title: Preparing For The Agentic Revolution: The Future Of Software
articles.author: Jay Bhatty
articles.summary: NatGasHub.com is incorporating AI agents into their datasets for clients in the oil and gas industry. The company plans to expand this service to offer individualized AI agents to clients to digest and analyze data based on each client's specific needs. This allows clients to automate tedious tasks and focus on strategic work.

articles.title: Trump unveils ‘Victory' brand of fragrances for men and women: ‘Have fun, and keep winning!'
articles.author: Colorado Politics
articles.summary: Donald Trump launched a new business venture: a fragrance. This was unveiled on Monday.

articles.title: Agentic AI Is Fast Approaching. Here's How to Get It Right
articles.author: Bob Walczak
articles.summary: The Model Context Protocol (MCP) is introduced as a new standard to enable automated workflows by facilitating communication between AI agents and different platforms. Major LLM providers like OpenAI, Gemini, and Claude are already supporting MCP. This aims to simplify integrations and enable automated workflows, improving efficiency and reducing the need for manual intervention.

articles.title: The Best 4th Of July Mattress Sales From Nectar, DreamCloud And More
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Nectar and DreamCloud are offering mattress sales for the 4th of July, potentially saving customers hundreds of dollars.

articles.title: AMD and Xbox are redefining game hardware
articles.author: Marty Spargo
articles.summary: Microsoft and AMD are developing a new Xbox that redefines the game console concept. The new Xbox is an innovative, cloud-powered, AI-ready platform accessible across multiple devices and reimagines gaming fundamentals.

articles.title: How QNETs direct selling revolution is empowering young entrepreneurs, shaping markets
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: QNET, a global wellness and lifestyle brand, is promoting direct selling through e-commerce in Africa. The company is advocating for legislation related to this model and empowering young entrepreneurs through its initiatives.

articles.title: Nothing founder Carl Pei slams tech as 'boring' as Headphone (1) and Phone (3) are launched
articles.author: Adrian Weckler
articles.summary: Nothing is launching two new products: the Headphone (1), a noise-cancelling headphone priced at €299, and the Phone (3), its first true flagship phone costing between €799 and €899. The Headphone (1) features a distinctive design, spatial audio, and AI-enhanced noise cancellation, while the Phone (3) boasts a high-brightness display, a large battery, and an upgraded triple-camera system. Both products will be available for purchase later this month.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Provides June and Second Quarter 2025 Delivery Update  Jul. 1, 2025 17:30
articles.summary: NIO Inc. announced its June and second quarter 2025 delivery results. The company delivered 24,925 vehicles in June 2025. These deliveries consisted of 14,593 NIO vehicles, 6,400 ONVO vehicles, and 3,932 FIREFLY vehicles.

articles.title: An AI Was Asked To Run A Small Shop. It Gave Discounts & Quickly Went Bankrupt
articles.author: Sukhbir Cheema
articles.summary: Anthropic tested its Claude 3.7 Sonnet model, nicknamed "Claudius," by having it manage a vending machine, including launching a "Custom Concierge" service. Claudius handled tasks from restocking to customer interaction. However, the experiment revealed limitations in the AI's ability to handle complex business decisions, nuance, and memory.

articles.title: 100,000 reviews can't be wrong — This Ninja Blender is a steal for $90 before Prime Day
articles.author: Miska Salemann
articles.summary: The Ninja Compact Blender is available at a discounted price before Amazon Prime Day. This blender is suitable for making smoothies, sauces, and crushing ice. It's highlighted as a versatile kitchen appliance for various needs, including quick meals and snacks.

articles.title: Airwrap Co-anda 2x: Dyson unveils $999 hair styling tool
articles.author: Rebekah Scanlan
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Airwrap Co-anda 2x, a new iteration of their popular Airwrap hair styling tool. The new version features an improved Hyperdymium motor for faster drying and less heat damage, along with AI-driven sensors and new attachments for easier styling. The Airwrap 2x will be available in Australia on July 30.

articles.title: LazPad Launches Play-to-Launch Platform, Revolutionizing AI Agent Creation with Dynamic DATs
articles.author: Three Laz Pad Pillars
articles.summary: LazAI has launched LazPad, a platform for launching AI agents that combines structured innovation with user engagement. LazPad uses Data Anchoring Tokens (DATs) to grow AI agents through user interaction and a three-zone system, including premium launches, open launches, and an explore zone. Users can also mint Companion DATs and trade them in the DAT Marketplace.

articles.title: Alibaba Launches Wan2.1 VACE: Transforming AI Video Creation with Free Relax Mode and Wan's Affordable Memberships
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: Alibaba, via Tongyi Lab, has launched Wan2.1 VACE, a new AI video creation platform featuring a 'Relax Mode' for free usage and a membership system starting at $6.50/month for premium features. The platform aims to democratize AI-generated content creation by offering flexible access and affordability, catering to both casual users and professional creators with options like a credit system and monthly memberships.

articles.title: Save 25% on Shiseido's suncare range, from sunscreen sticks to SPF lotions
articles.author: Daisy Lester
articles.summary: Shiseido launched a summer sale featuring a 25% discount on its sun care line. The sale includes a cult sunscreen praised for its invisible finish and hydration, an SPF stick noted for exercise use, a makeup-sun protection hybrid compact, a tanning compact with bronzing shades, and a bestselling SPF50 cream, all featuring unique technologies and skincare benefits.

articles.title: Reddit Launches New Ad Optimization Tips In-Stream
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Reddit is introducing new automated ad tips to its Ad Manager platform. These recommendations provide data-driven suggestions to improve campaign performance and maximize ad spend based on Reddit's best practices. The platform also includes an 'Optimization Score' to assess the effectiveness of Reddit ads approach.

articles.title: Meghan's ‘essence of sun-drenched outdoor moments' wine sells out in under hour
articles.author: Laura Elston
articles.summary: A new pale pink wine, packaged in a clear bottle with a white gold-rimmed label, launched on wine.asever.com. The wine is described as a delicately balanced rose featuring soft notes of stone fruit, gentle minerality, and a lasting finish.

articles.title: Is This RM4,499 Vacuum Worth It? We Spent Two Weeks With Samsung's AI Jet Ultra
articles.author: Laila Zain
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke AI Jet Ultra, a high-performance cordless stick vacuum. Key features include a HexaJet Motor delivering 400W suction, AI Cleaning Mode 2.0 which detects the surface type and adjusts suction power, Clean Station which automatically empties the bin, a dual-battery setup, and a multi-layer HEPA filtration system.

articles.title: Meghan's wine with ‘essence of sun-drenched outdoor moments' goes on sale
articles.author: Laura Elston
articles.summary: A pale pink wine was launched on wine.asever.com. The wine is described as a delicately balanced rose with soft notes of stone fruit, gentle minerality, and a lasting finish.

articles.title: Origin Contour mattress topper review: a sofa bed saviour
articles.author: Clara Wolsey
articles.summary: Origin launched the Contour mattress topper, designed to enhance mattress comfort. Prices range from £120 to £188, available exclusively on the Origin website. The topper features a washable cover, cooling gel-infused beads, and straps to secure it to the mattress.

articles.title: Mentra Raises $8 Million To Launch Open-Source OS For Smart Glasses
articles.author: Charlie Fink
articles.summary: Mentra is launching MentraOS 2.0, an open-source operating system for smart glasses, and Mentra Live, a modular smart glasses kit aimed at enterprise and developer users, available for pre-order at $249 and shipping this fall. MentraOS already supports multiple hardware options and powers live captioning, translation, notifications, and an AI assistant.

articles.title: Meghan Markle finally launches £22 wine - but there's a catch
articles.author: Sophia Papamavroudi
articles.summary: Meghan Markle has launched As Ever's first wine, a rosé sourced from California's Napa Valley. The rosé features soft notes of stone fruit, gentle minerality, and a lasting finish, and is available for purchase in the US in batches of three, six, and twelve.

articles.title: Nothing July 2025 Event: Here's what to expect at launch programme in London
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Carl Pei, co-founder of a company, will announce two new products at an event scheduled for July 1st at 18:00 BST in London.

articles.title: This Roomba Robot Vacuum And Mop Is A 'Lifesaver For Busy Homes' — And 50% Off No
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: The Roomba robot vacuum and mop combo is a device lauded for its effectiveness in cleaning floors. It integrates vacuuming and mopping functionalities, navigates around furniture, and can be scheduled via an app. User reviews praise its ability to pick up pet hair, crumbs, and dust, providing a hands-free cleaning experience.

articles.title: Swiggy whips up treat for price-conscious and Gen Z foodies, launches '99 Store' with free delivery. Check details
articles.author: Eshita Gain
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched '99 Store', a new segment on its platform offering single-serve dishes at ₹99 with free delivery. This service aims to attract price-conscious users and high-frequency Gen Z consumers. Through 'eco saver' delivery mode, users in over 175 cities can get free delivery for orders worth ₹99.

articles.title: Brand news: The Korean coffee blowing up online is coming to Israel
articles.author: RONIT MATHIAS
articles.summary: A stylish brand invites consumers to a vacation in Capri. An upgraded beauty product is available. A mezuzah, designed as a tribute to the country, has been created.

articles.title: Get a Deal on This Backup Drive You Could Kick Out a Window
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: Crucial launched the X10 rugged external SSD, which is IP65 rated and drop-resistant up to three meters, offering protection against dust and splashes. The Crucial X10 is available in different versions such as the 6TB version for $292, providing secure portability and ample storage for system backups and file offloads.

articles.title: MCE Systems and AT&T Land Gold Prize in 2025 U.S. Customer Experience Awards for "Best Digital CX"
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: MCE Systems and AT&T collaborated to launch the AT&T Device Help app, a self-service tool designed to improve customer mobile device troubleshooting. The app provides proactive device health management, fault pinpointing, and guided solutions by combining MCE's diagnostics platform with AT&T's device knowledgebase, aiming to resolve device issues quickly and improve operational efficiency.

articles.title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Aura Edition review: Keeping things basic and solid
articles.author: Sourabh Kulesh
articles.summary: Lenovo has launched the Yoga Slim 7i Aura Edition laptop, powered by Intel's Core Ultra 7 258V processor. The laptop features a 2.8K display, up to 15 hours of battery life, and includes innovative operational modes like Wellness Mode, Shield Mode, and Collaboration Mode. It is priced starting at Rs 1,32,999.

articles.title: LG Shows Off Next-Gen, AI-Powered, ThinQ Smart Home
articles.author: Paul Lamkin
articles.summary: LG is expanding its ThinQ smart home platform with the introduction of the LG ThinQ ON Home Hub, a smart speaker, and the Q9 Self-driving AI Home Hub, a mobile robot. The ThinQ UP system now allows for continuous updates and hyper-personalization of connected devices and appliances, adapting to user's habits over time.

articles.title: Dove's Garden Tea Party Collection Brings Fancy ‘Bridgerton' Vibes to Your Shower
articles.author: Nealy Simms
articles.summary: Dove launched a limited-edition 'Garden Tea Party' collection of floral-infused personal-care products. The line includes four scents—Honeysuckle Gardenia, Rose Berry Bouquet, English Pear Blossom, and Velvet Fig Bloom—available as solid antiperspirant deodorant, body wash, body scrub, and bar soaps, all priced under $10.

articles.title: 'Customer experience is your business'
articles.author: Sponsor Post
articles.summary: NiCE launched CXone Mpower, a unified AI-powered platform designed to orchestrate workflows, agents, and knowledge across the service lifecycle. CXone Mpower aims to unify AI capabilities, reduce overhead, increase automation, and improve performance. The platform has led to improvements in customer satisfaction and cost savings for companies like Mitchell, Banco de Brasil, TD Bank, and Lowe's.

articles.title: A Beginner's Guide to Using Vuse Pods Safely and Effectively
articles.author: Ameyaw Debrah
articles.summary: Vuse offers convenient, pre-filled pods designed for easy use in their vaping devices, featuring nicotine salts for a gentler experience. They provide models like Vuse Alto and ePod to suit different lifestyles and offer a variety of nicotine strengths and flavors. Ensuring proper usage, maintenance, and storage will deliver an enjoyable and secure experience.

articles.title: Next shoppers can't get enough of £24 summer dress and it's already selling out
articles.author: Anna Starnes
articles.summary: Next is receiving positive feedback for its "Twist Short Sleeved T-shirt Summer Dress", which is available in various colours and sizes. Customers describe the dress as a comfortable, flattering, and versatile summer staple. Other companies like New Look and Marks and Spencer offer similar dresses, but the Next dress is generating significant buzz online.

articles.title: Samsung One UI 8 Watch Update: Pixel Watch Killer?
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to release One UI 8 Watch, a major software update based on Wear OS 6 for its Galaxy Watch lineup. The update will bring enhanced performance, a refined user interface, expanded health and fitness tracking, improved battery life, and seamless integration with the Samsung ecosystem. The release date is anticipated soon and aims to make the Samsung Galaxy Watch more competitive with the Google Pixel Watch.

articles.title: Aldi's £3.49 lip balms crowned Beauty Club favourite as Summer Lacura line drops
articles.author: Stephanie Bateman
articles.summary: Aldi has launched new additions to its Lacura beauty line, including Lacura Lip Balms in three flavors for £3.49, a Lacura Watermelon Serum for £4.99, and Lacura Sculpting Bronzing Stick for £4.49. The collection also features new fragrances such as Lacura Cardinal Red Eau de Parfum, Lacura Liquid Luxe Eau de Parfum and Lacura Intense Passion Eau de Parfum for £5.99 each.

articles.title: Putin puts government to work to develop national messenger
articles.author: TASS
articles.summary: The Russian government is supporting the development of a new Russian messenger platform to integrate public and banking services. VK's Max messenger has been proposed as a candidate for the platform, offering features like chats, calls, mini-apps, and bots. The platform will be integrated with "Gosuslugi" (Public Services Portal of the Russian Federation) to resolve all matters within one application.

articles.title: Predators' front office scrambles to address roster holes: Free agency frenzy begins!
articles.summary: The WeAreIowa app enables users to stream WeAreIowa content on their phones.

articles.title: ZTE's New Smartphone Hints at What the iPhone 18 Might Become
articles.author: Dan Mitchell
articles.summary: ZTE launched a new flagship device featuring innovative features and sleek aesthetics. This launch has drawn comparison with future Apple's iPhone. Apple tends to chart its own course with design and functionality.

articles.title: July 2025: Top smartphones launching this month
articles.author: Rohit KVN
articles.summary: Nothing Inc. is planning to launch Nothing Phone 3. OnePlus is teasing new Nord 5, Nord CE 5 phones, and Buds 4 series earphones. Oppo is teasing Oppo Reno 14. Tecno Mobile is teasing Tecno Pova 7 series. Samsung is teasing Galaxy Z Fold Ultra and Motorola is teasing Motorola Moto G96 series.

articles.title: MobiFone Launches Saymee, a Gen Z-Focused Digital Brand, with Amdocs connectX
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: Amdocs' connectX platform enables MobiFone to launch Saymee, a new digital brand in Vietnam. Saymee is specifically designed for Gen Z subscribers. Amdocs connectX platform is a cloud-native SaaS.

articles.title: Practical Implementations Of AI In Food Innovation
articles.author: Alexandr Khomich
articles.summary: Mars uses AI to analyze vendor data from Alibaba to invent new products like spicy chocolate for the Chinese market. Mondelez International uses AI and ML algorithms to create new Oreo recipes, considering factors like cost, nutrition, and sustainability. Alpro leveraged prescriptive analytics to build an API recommending tailored smoothie recipes that include the company's products.

articles.title: Mazda gives us a first peek at the third-generation CX-5 SUV ahead of July reveal
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Mazda is set to globally debut the third-generation CX-5 on July 10, promising a sharper design, more spacious cabin, and advanced technology. The new CX-5 will feature an in-house hybrid powertrain and is planned for introduction in South Africa within the next two years.

articles.title: OnePlus Nord 5 and Nord CE 5 first look: Here are new OnePlus phones in all their glory
articles.summary: OnePlus is launching the OnePlus Nord 5 and OnePlus Nord CE 5, the next generation of the OnePlus Nord series, expected on July 8, 2025. The Nord 5 features a Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 processor and a marble-like matte finish, while the Nord CE 5 features MediaTek Dimensity 8350 Apex chip and vibrant color options, both sporting vertically aligned camera layouts and premium designs.

articles.title: Galaxy Z Fold 7 & Z Flip 7: Thin Design & Release Date Hints
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is set to unveil the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 at its Galaxy Unpacked event in July 2025. The new foldable phones are expected to feature significantly thinner designs, enhanced durability, improved screen technology, next-generation processors, and an optimized One UI for a seamless foldable experience.

articles.title: You can now order meals worth ₹99 on Swiggy
articles.summary: Swiggy has launched a new service called '99 store' on its platform. This initiative offers single meals at a price of ₹99 and is available in over 175 cities across India. The orders are delivered through Swiggy's "Eco Saver" mode.

articles.title: Orangekloud Announces July 25 Launch of eMOBIQ® AI Platform
articles.author: Orangekloud Technology Inc.
articles.summary: Orangekloud Technology Inc. has officially launched eMOBIQ AI, an AI-driven no-code development platform, scheduled for public release on July 25, 2025. Enhancements to the platform, including AI agents and user experience improvements, were made following a successful beta program.

articles.title: 41 Things You'll Wanna Keep In Your Bag To Squash Summer Problems As Soon As They Materialize Right In Front Of Your Eyes
articles.author: Elizabeth Lilly
articles.summary: ONE/SIZE by Patrick Starr launched 'Til Dawn Mattifying Waterproof Setting Spray in a mini size. I Dew Care introduced "Tap Secret" mattifying powder shampoo in six colors. Neutrogena launched a makeup eraser stick for quick touch-ups.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core Debuts in India at Rs 4,999 with AI Interpreter and ANC
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy Buds Core in India, its first TWS earbuds priced under Rs 5,000, with features like Active Noise Cancellation and Galaxy AI-powered real-time Interpreter. The earbuds include dynamic drivers, a triple-mic setup, and are available in Black and White. They will be available starting June 27 on Samsung.com, Amazon, and select offline retailers with a launch offer of Rs 1,000 off with specific Galaxy A series purchases.

articles.title: Broadband ISP TalkTalk UK Adopt NiCE's AI-Powered Customer Service Platform
articles.author: Mark Jackson
articles.summary: An internet access provider is adopting CXone Mpower, a new AI-powered customer service automation platform from NiCE, to unify multiple operating systems into a single platform. This new solution aims to streamline end-to-end customer service processes and support front-line support agents, as part of wider transformation plans to simplify business and revolutionize customer experience.

articles.title: Google Doodle Celebrates AI Mode
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Google is launching 'AI Mode,' a new AI-powered search experience, accessible in the U.S. and being tested in India. This service synthesizes information to provide conversational and interactive answers, representing a significant shift from traditional search engines and can be accessed via google.com/aimode.

articles.title: moto g96 5g
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G96 5G, a new mid-premium smartphone.

articles.title: Primark's 'gorgeous' £26 summer midi dress 'looks expensive'
articles.author: Elle May Rice
articles.summary: Primark introduced 'The Edit V Neck Midi Dress', retailing at £26. The dress is available in yellow or white, sizes XS to XL, and features a V-neckline and relaxed A-line silhouette.

articles.title: The DIY Photographer's Secret: Replace Backgrounds, Not Equipment
articles.author: akintayo eribake
articles.summary: Pippit introduces an AI-powered background design tool that allows creators to transform phone-taken product photos into branded, polished assets. The tool enables users to replace cluttered or uninspiring backgrounds with professional-looking scenes, eliminating the need for expensive equipment or studio setups. Users can upload photos, adjust the background using presets or prompts, and export the final image for social media, web, or advertisements.

articles.title: New Look's bestselling summer dress may only be £15, but shoppers say it's 'great quality and fits perfectly'
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: New Look has reduced the price of their Puff Sleeve Shirred Mini Dress in pale blue to £15.59. The dress is available in sizes six to 22 and made from 100% cotton, featuring a relaxed fit and mini length, suitable for summer wear.

articles.title: New Zealand's emerging whiskey industry finds a global audience with export prices more than Ireland and the US
articles.author: Global Desk
articles.summary: New Zealand distilleries like Cardrona, Pokeno, Scapegrace, and Thomson are redefining New Zealand whiskey through innovation in sourcing local barley and experimenting with aging processes. These premium, small-batch spirits are gaining recognition in the global market, with exports growing significantly.

articles.title: Scentient Launches Clean Fragrance Subscription for the Conscious Consumer
articles.author: Scentient
articles.summary: A new service curates and offers non-toxic, cruelty-free perfumes sourced from artisan brands. This service aims to provide consumers with ethically conscious and high-quality fragrance options.

articles.title: Scentient Launches Clean Fragrance Subscription for the Conscious Consumer
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Scentient, a clean fragrance subscription service, launched on July 1st, offering curated, non-toxic perfumes from independent brands. Customers can choose between a monthly box for $22.95 or a quarterly box for $63, each designed around a seasonal theme and scent preference. Debut fragrances include Neon Neroli and Tarkine from Váhy, and quarterly selections also feature scents from ESAS NYC and Orchid + Ash.

articles.title: Scentient Launches Clean Fragrance Subscription for the Conscious Consumer
articles.summary: Scentient launched a clean fragrance subscription service on July 1, 2025, offering curated, non-toxic perfumes from independent brands. The subscription model includes monthly and quarterly boxes with fragrances vetted by the Scentient team, featuring debut fragrances like Váhy - Neon Neroli and Váhy - Tarkine.

articles.title: Sony's Game-Changing Camera Sensor for Smartphones
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Sony is launching the LYT-828, a new 50-megapixel CMOS camera sensor for smartphones, featuring 17 stops of dynamic range and UHCG technology for enhanced low-light performance. The LYT-828 delivers a constant HDR preview and utilizes single-frame HDR fusion with multi-frame HDR to improve image quality in high-contrast scenes and while zooming.

articles.title: Jenn's Summer Beauty Non-Negotiables
articles.author: Sheerluxe
articles.summary: The article highlights the launch of new beauty products, including an SPF-setting powder hybrid, a bargain fragrance, and a hair oil. These represent new offerings from companies in the beauty and personal care sector.

articles.title: Japanese gaming firm CyberStep plans to invest 1b yen into its new crypto arm
articles.author: BTC Manager
articles.summary: CyberStep, a Japanese online claw machine operator, is launching a new business arm. This indicates a new service or product offering from the company.

articles.title: Today's Google Doodle hides a powerful new AI search tool
articles.summary: Google is launching its new "AI Mode" feature, a service that integrates AI into search functionality. This launch is being promoted with a special Doodle and bouncy animation across various platforms. AI Mode is currently fully available in the US and is being tested in India, with plans for further expansion and features like Search Live.

articles.title: 27 Products With Results To Stop You In Your Tracks
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Nivea introduces a lightweight gel-cream that uses Q10 to firm and moisturize skin. Etude launches Dear Darling Water Tint, a long-lasting lip stain comparable to Benefit. Catrice releases "Instant Awake" Under Eye Brightener, available in four shades, while Maybelline presents Dark Circles Treatment Concealer with Haloxyl. Mise En Scéne features a moisturizing hair serum made with seven nourishing oils for heat protection and hydration.

articles.title: Xiaomi made a cheap Ferrari EV. Who needs Porsche?
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched its luxury electric sport utility vehicle, the YU7. The YU7 is a stylish and tech-laden SUV offering up to 835km of driving range at an affordable price, with the entry-level version costing 253,500 yuan (S$45,000).

articles.title: ODWALLA® LAUNCHES NATIONWIDE ONLINE STORES ON AMAZON® AND ODWALLADRINKS.COM
articles.author: Grupo Jumex
articles.summary: Odwalla has launched a direct delivery service nationwide. Consumers can now purchase Odwalla's full lineup of 100% fruit juices and smoothies on Amazon and at www.OdwallaDrinks.com. The offer of 25% off the first order is valid through July 31, 2025.

articles.title: Harnessing idle computing power
articles.author: Hoang An
articles.summary: Hyra is launching a decentralized AI infrastructure service that leverages the computing power of edge devices like smartphones. This service offers a cost advantage of up to 60% compared to traditional providers. Hyra uses a token reward system to incentivize users who contribute computing power from their devices.

articles.title: Alibaba launches Qwen-VLo to rival ChatGPT-4o in AI image generation
articles.summary: Alibaba has announced its new AI model, Qwen-VLo, designed for image generation, rivaling models like ChatGPT-4o. This model offers improvements such as understanding complex prompts, making specific image changes without altering unrelated parts, and supporting multiple languages. Additionally, it can combine multiple images, resize images into various formats, although still in early stage and under development.

articles.title: East Hampton Shucker Company CEO John Nicholas Talks Dan's Red, White & Brews
articles.author: Timothy Bolger
articles.summary: East Hampton Shucker Company, led by CEO John Nicholas, has invented the East Hampton Shucker. This device is designed as the fastest, safest, and easiest way to open oysters at home, addressing the difficulties and dangers traditionally associated with shucking oysters.

articles.title: Summer Scoop-tacular: National Ice Cream Month Starts Now!
articles.author: Ben
articles.summary: Ben & Jerry's is celebrating National Ice Cream Month in July with new Scoop Shop exclusives. These exclusives are in addition to their current lineup, limited batch surprises, and ways to share their signature ice cream chunks.

articles.title: MTN eyes slice of Nigeria's $850m cloud market
articles.author: Temitayo Jaiyeola
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria is launching new cloud services to capture a share of Nigeria's cloud market, valued between $600 million and $850 million in 2024. The service, costing $20 million, will be hosted in a new $100 million data center and will be priced in naira, with a 15-20% launch discount, targeting startups, banks, government agencies, and businesses.

articles.title: NIO Inc. Provides June and Second Quarter 2025 Delivery Update
articles.author: Nio Inc.
org: The Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited
articles.summary: NIO Inc. announced its June and second quarter 2025 delivery results. The deliveries consisted of vehicles from NIO, ONVO, and FIREFLY brands. NIO's ET5 and ET5T ranked first among mid-size battery electric sedans in the China NEV-IQS study, while the EC6 claimed the top spot in the premium BEV segment in the China NEV-APEAL study.

articles.title: Alibaba unveils Qwen VLo: Free AI model for text-to-image and photo editing
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Alibaba launched Qwen VLo, a new AI model designed for image generation. This model expands on the Qwen 2.5 vision language system, introducing enhanced features for image creation and editing.

articles.title: Moto G96 5G launch date confirmed for India: Check out the expected specifications, price, and more
articles.author: Anusha Jain
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G96 5G in India on July 9th. The phone features a 6.67-inch Full HD+ OLED screen with a 144 Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 CPU, 50MP Sony LYT-700C primary camera, a 5,500mAh battery with 68W fast charging, and IP68 dust and water resistance. It will be available in Pantone-validated colors and is expected to be priced around ₹20,000.

articles.title: These three underrated features make ChatGPT way better
articles.author: Doug Aamoth
articles.summary: ChatGPT has useful features that quietly make life easier for gen-AI users. One unsung hero is the ability to edit prompts, allowing users to correct typos or add crucial context after submitting a prompt.

articles.title: Next shoppers praise 'comfy and elegant' £39 black dress that 'hangs perfectly'
articles.author: Phoebe Barton
articles.summary: Next is offering the "Friends Like These Black V-Neck Flutter Sleeve Midi Dress" for £39, available in sizes six to 24 in regular and petite fits. The dress features a V-neck and flutter sleeves, and it is made from ITY jersey fabric. Debenhams is selling the "Jolie Moi Short Sleeve Soft Silky Jersey Maxi Dress" for £59.25, and Nobody's Child offers "Black Tiered Lia Midi Dress" priced at £69.

articles.title: 'Stylish and comfortable' Next animal print summer dress 'perfect for holiday' is £28
articles.author: Rachael Davis
articles.summary: Next has launched the 'Animal Leopard Print V-Neck Ruffle Sleeve Mini Dress with Linen', priced at £28. This mini-dress, featuring a V-neck collar and short ruffle sleeves in a linen-blend fabric, is available in sizes 6 to 26 and has received positive customer reviews.

articles.title: Interview with a cross-industry UX designer: Creating meaningful experiences for FinTech, logistics and EdTech
articles.author: BI Africa
articles.summary: Viamo integrated generative AI into its communication system, enabling features like language switching and content delivery in local languages. Waypoint Commodities streamlined onboarding by integrating DocuSign, which reduced freight and shipment documentation time. FlexiSAF launched a design system to boost team speed and ensure consistency across design and code.

articles.title: Lidl's selling Karcher jet washer for £30 less than B&Q –great for cleaning patios, fences & garden furniture in seconds
articles.author: Henna Sharma
articles.summary: Lidl is offering the Karcher pressure washer for £89.99, significantly cheaper than B&Q's price of £122.70. This pressure washer is ideal for cleaning patios, fences, and garden furniture, featuring a high-pressure spray gun, hose, and dirt blaster lance.

articles.title: 'Calpis faucet' serves up new experience for drinkers of Japan's long-beloved beverage
articles.author: Mainichi Japan
articles.summary: Asahi Soft Drinks Co. launched a pilot project on July 1 for its 'Calpis faucet,' allowing people to serve themselves the company's Calpis beverage. The Calpis faucet container is placed at Hotel Vison from July 1 through Sept. 30, and the company plans to begin full-scale service in 2026, targeting 1,000 faucets across the country by 2030.

articles.title: Scottish woman began menopause at 25 so her friends make a product that sells out 3 times
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Gloriah launched Soul Gel, a water-based lubricant designed for menopausal and perimenopausal women. The product quickly sold out multiple times after its launch in Tesco and Superdrug.  Soul Gel is priced at £17, is available for pre-order with shipping beginning on July 14, and is currently discounted for Daily Record readers.

articles.title: Monsoon deals on washing machines! Min 40% off on top load and front load models from Samsung, LG, Bosch and more brands
articles.author: Kanika Budhiraja
articles.summary: Amazon is hosting a 'Monsoon Appliances Sale' featuring discounted washing machines from brands like Samsung, LG, Bosch, Voltas Beko, Godrej, Whirlpool, and Haier. The sale includes both top-load and front-load models, many of which feature technologies like Inverter Direct Drive, Eco Bubble, and Double Waterfall, and special features like hygiene steam and in-built heaters.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 & Z Flip 7: Launch, Price, Specs
articles.author: Alexandra Hartman
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7, with pre-orders already initiated. The Galaxy Z Fold 7 is expected to start at Rs 1,69,990 in India and feature a Snapdragon processor, while the Galaxy Z Flip 7 might debut at Rs 98,990 and potentially use an Exynos processor.

articles.title: new phone 3 nothing
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Nothing, a consumer tech brand based in London, is preparing to unveil its next-generation flagship product.

articles.title: Nothing Phone 3 launch livestream India
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Nothing, a London-based consumer tech brand, is preparing to unveil its next-generation flagship product.

articles.title: Coca-Cola's soda "Dr Pepper" released "Dr Pepper Zero Strawberry Cream Scent" on the 1st, which make..
articles.author: Choi Ki-Sung
articles.summary: Coca-Cola's Dr Pepper released 'Dr Pepper Zero Strawberry Cream Scent' in Korea, a new zero-sugar and zero-calorie soda. This is the first new Dr Pepper product in Korea since 2022 and is available in 350ml cans through various online and offline channels, including Coca-Cola's official app, CokePLAY.

articles.title: All-New 2026 Mazda CX-5 to Debut on July 10 USA
articles.author: Mazda Canada Inc
articles.summary: Mazda will unveil the all-new 2026 CX-5 on July 10, 2025. The CX-5 is designed for urban and active lifestyles, appealing to customers needing a versatile vehicle for daily errands and weekend trips. It offers a confidence-inspiring drive, engaging design, and functionality.

articles.title: All-New 2026 Mazda CX-5 to Debut on July 10
articles.summary: Mazda will unveil the all-new 2026 CX-5 on July 10, 2025. The CX-5 is designed for urban and active lifestyles, aiming to appeal to both existing and new Mazda customers with its driving experience, design, and functionality.

articles.title: 2026 Mazda CX-5 teased, reveal date set for next-generation mid-size SUV
articles.author: William Stopford
articles.summary: Mazda is preparing to reveal its next-generation mid-size SUV. The SUV will offer hybrid power for the first time.

articles.title: Nissan Patrol. You find it. You keep it – 10 days left to enter
articles.author: Carexpert.com.au
articles.summary: Nissan Australia partnered with another entity to give away a MY25 Nissan Patrol Ti-L.

articles.title: ARKAY ALCOHOL-FREE WHISKY - A Clean Choice. Fearless Living. Clean Sips. Bold Steps.
articles.author: Ar Kay Beverages
articles.summary: Arkay Zero Proof Spirits, a pioneer in alcohol-free spirits, is launching a global marketing campaign. The campaign will highlight its flagship product, Arkay Alcohol-Free Whisky, with the message: "A Clean Choice. Fearless Living. Clean Sips. Bold Steps."

articles.title: Moto G96 5G India Launch Confirmed for July 9: Snapdragon 7s Gen 2, 144Hz Curved Display, and More
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola is launching its new mid-premium smartphone, the Moto G96 5G, in India on July 9th. The phone features a Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 SoC, a 6.67-inch 144Hz pOLED display, a 50MP Sony camera, a 5,500mAh battery, and IP68 water/dust resistance, and will be available on Flipkart in multiple Pantone-validated colors.

articles.title: எலெக்ட்ரிக் டஸ்டர் எஸ்யூவி மாடலையும் வெளியிடும் திட்டத்தில் ரெனோ.. இந்தியாவிலும் வெளியாகுமா?
articles.summary: Renault plans to launch an electric Duster model in India. This indicates the introduction of a new electric vehicle option from Renault in the Indian market.

articles.title: BYD Drives into the East: Ampara Becomes Latest Addition to Expanding Showroom Network
articles.summary: BYD, in partnership with John Keells CG Auto, has opened its fifth dealership in Ampara, Sri Lanka, showcasing models like the BYD SEAL, SEALION 6, DOLPHIN and ATTO 3. This expansion aims to improve the accessibility of BYD's New Energy Vehicles (NEVs) and is supported by plans to install EV charging stations in the Ampara vicinity.

articles.title: How National Foods is balancing tradition with modernity
articles.author: Web Desk
articles.summary: National Foods Limited has launched 'National Drizz'l', a new range of sauces designed to appeal to the younger generation. The company has also relaunched its Recipe Mixes packaging with a more contemporary and colorful design, also targeting a younger audience. These initiatives reflect National Foods' adaptation to changing consumer demographics and preferences.

articles.title: Samsung Announces Pre Reserve for Next Generation of Galaxy Foldables in India
articles.summary: Samsung is set to launch its next generation of foldable smartphones on July 9 in New York. Indian customers can pre-reserve these smartphones for INR 2000 and receive benefits worth up to INR 5999, including early delivery. The new foldable smartphones will feature an AI-powered interface and improved hardware.

articles.title: From Doom To Dune, Nvidia's Multi-Frame Generation Is An Absolute Game Changer For Mid and High End PCs
articles.author: Eric Switzer
articles.summary: Nvidia's DLSS 4 introduces multi-frame generation, significantly boosting frame rates on 50-series GPUs. Tests with RTX 5080 and games like Doom: The Dark Ages and Dune: Awakening demonstrate its ability to create additional frames, improving smoothness and performance, especially on high refresh rate displays. While occasional artifacting and increased latency may occur, the technology effectively enhances visual fidelity and unlocks higher frame rates in modern games.

articles.title: Woolworths sends nostalgic shoppers wild over new $12 item: 'I'm going to cry'
articles.author: CINDY TRAN
articles.summary: Woolworths has introduced Caramelised Biscuit Lamingtons, a twist on the classic treat, featuring a vanilla sponge dipped in caramel-flavored chocolate and rolled in caramelised biscuit crumbs, priced at $12 for a pack of four. Additionally, Woolworths launched Choc Chip Cookie Mud Cake for $7, a caramel mud cake packed with cookie pieces and topped with choc chip drizzle.

articles.title: Jones Road's launches lightweight tinted moisturiser in time for the heatwave
articles.author: Tiffany Lo
articles.summary: Jones Road has launched the 'Just Enough Tinted Moisturiser,' a lightweight and breathable formula designed for hot summer days. The moisturiser offers coverage for blemishes and is available in 16 shades catering to various undertones. Its non-comedogenic formula includes Sodium Hyaluronate to restore suppleness and improve the appearance of dry skin.

articles.title: Beauty product that costs £15 at Next is now only £1.99 in Home Bargains
articles.author: Charlotte Smith
articles.summary: Home Bargains is offering Bondi Sands' Pure Self-Tanning Face Mist for £1.99, a significant discount from its usual retail price of £14.99-£15 at other retailers like Next and Argos. Bondi Sands describes the product as non-comedogenic and suitable for sensitive skin.

articles.title: Galaxy Unpacked July 2025: The Ultra Experience Is Ready To Unfold
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics will host an Unpacked event on July 9 in Brooklyn, New York, to unveil next-generation Galaxy devices featuring a new AI-powered interface and enhanced hardware. The event will showcase the latest additions to the Galaxy portfolio, integrating Galaxy AI, and will be streamed live on Samsung's website and YouTube channel.

articles.title: LG Unveils Colossal Qned Evo Promising a New Era of Immersive Ai-powered Entertainment
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched its new 100-inch QNED evo TV in the Gulf region. This TV features Dynamic QNED Color technology, an α8 AI Processor 4K Gen2, and AI-powered personalized interaction, and is designed for spacious homes and luxurious interiors, offering immersive visuals and sound.

articles.title: Amazon's Biggest Prime Day Event Yet: An Extended 4 Days of Exceptional Savings and Deep Discounts from Top Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Amazon announced its biggest Prime Day event ever, starting July 8, offering millions of deals worldwide. Prime members can access discounts up to 30% off on items from brands like Away, Breville, Bissell, Kiehl's, Milk Makeup, Ninja, Sony, and Too Faced. The event includes deals on lawn and garden items, outdoor toys, pool and beach essentials, and grocery and household items, with new deals appearing every 5 minutes during select periods.

articles.title: Amazon's Biggest Prime Day Event Yet: An Extended 4 Days of Exceptional Savings and Deep Discounts from Top Brands
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Amazon announced its biggest Prime Day event ever, starting July 8th, offering millions of deals worldwide. Prime members can access discounts on a wide range of products, including Amazon devices like Echo, Ring, and Fire TV, and from brands such as Levi's, Dyson, and Samsung. New offers include daily deal drops featuring discounts from Ninja, Sony, and Too Faced, as well as savings on back-to-school essentials and exclusive benefits for Prime members.

articles.title: 27 Cheap Beauty Items To Upkeep Hair, Skin, And Nails
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: OGX introduced Argan Oil of Morocco Curl-Defining Cream, Skin1004 introduced pore tightening and lifting masks and CeraVe launched non-comedogenic salicylic acid body wash. L'Oréal released Wonder Water Lamellar Hair Treatment. Beauty of Joseon introduced serum for all the glow getters.

articles.title: Haier, Abenson unveil the future of home entertainment with the launch of the Haier Mini LED TV
articles.summary: Haier Philippines, in partnership with Abenson, launched the Haier Mini LED TV at an event in Abenson's Quezon Avenue Flagship Store. The Haier Mini LED TV features True Color Pro technology, ultra-fine contrast from mini LED backlighting, 4K HDR resolution, Dolby Vision and Dolby Atmos, Game Mode Pro, and voice-activated controls through built-in AI.

articles.title: Moto G96 5G with Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor launching in India on 9 July: Here's what to expect
articles.author: Aman Gupta
articles.summary: Motorola is launching the Moto G96 smartphone in India on July 9. The Moto G96 will feature a 6.67 inch Full HD+ OLED display with 144Hz refresh rate, Qualcomm Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 processor, 50MP Sony LYT-700C primary shooter, and a 5,500mAh battery with 68W fast charging.

articles.title: Google Launches Doppl, an AI-Based Virtual Trial App for Clothing
articles.author: Rehan Oktra Halim
articles.summary: Google has launched Doppl, a new AI-based application designed to allow users to virtually try on clothes. The app is currently available on iOS and Android for users in the United States, focusing on clothing categories such as tops, bottoms, and dresses. Users upload photos of themselves and clothing to visualize the virtual appearance.

articles.title: Walk, run and train in the best Adidas shoes
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: Adidas provides customers with high-quality and fashionable shoes that come in various styles.

articles.title: Vintage resistance
articles.author: Bhanu Garg
articles.summary: The content highlights the shift from traditional tools like Microsoft PowerPoint to platforms like Canva and Google Slides, which offer hassle-free collaboration. These platforms are being increasingly adopted by younger generations in ad agencies due to their collaborative features, representing a disruption of the status quo in the way presentations are created and shared.

articles.title: The Mainichi News Quiz: What bit of fancy new tech is Lawson using in a Tokyo store?
articles.author: Mainichi Japan
articles.summary: Lawson introduced new technologies in its next-generation convenience store in Tokyo. These include facial recognition payment systems at store entrances, drone-based delivery services for customers, and artificial intelligence-driven cameras providing personalized product recommendations.

articles.title: The Mainichi News Quiz Answer for July 1
articles.author: Mainichi Japan
articles.summary: Lawson introduced AI-driven cameras in its next-generation convenience store in Tokyo. These cameras analyze customer behavior and provide personalized product recommendations based on actions like picking up items or pausing near shelves. The aim is to enhance the shopping experience and improve store efficiency.

articles.title: Marketing Lessons From NYC's Most Cravable Salmon And Cream Cheese Bagel
articles.author: Michelle Greenwald
articles.summary: Apollo Bagels in New York City has introduced a superior bagel experience by focusing on meticulous attention to detail. They offer a smoked white fish bagel with sliced cucumber and dill, emphasizing simplicity and deliciousness, setting them apart from competitors.

articles.title: 2025 MG HS Super Hybrid prices cut ahead of Australian release
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: CarExpert is offering hundreds of new car deals, inviting customers to browse and potentially find a great deal with expert assistance.

articles.title: 42 Summery Things From Amazon's 'Most Wished For' List
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Several new products are highlighted for summer use.  Laneige introduces Neo Blurring Powder, and E.l.f. launches Suntouchable Invisible Sunscreen and Glow Reviver Melting Lip Balm. Sol de Janeiro promotes their hair and body fragrance mist building on the popularity of their Brazilian Bum Bum Cream. Tower 28 launches SOS Spray.

articles.title: Xiaomi YU7 electric SUV sells out in minutes: a SUV threat to Tesla and BYD
articles.author: Danielle Collis
articles.summary: Xiaomi, led by founder Leo Jin, launched its new electric SUV, the YU7, which received over 200,000 orders within minutes. The YU7 comes in three variants (Standard, Pro, and Max) with varying power, range, and features, all supporting ultra-fast charging. Xiaomi previously entered the car market with the SU7 sedan, having already sold more than 258,000 units.

articles.title: DoubleVerify unveils AI tool to boost video ad performance
articles.author: Back End News
articles.summary: DoubleVerify launched DV Authentic AdVantage, an AI-powered tool to improve ad performance across closed video platforms. This new solution combines DoubleVerify's verification technology with DV Scibids AI to help advertisers manage ad costs and quality on platforms like YouTube.

articles.title: Modon launches Wadeem, its first residential plots community  on Hudayriyat Island
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Modon has announced the launch of Wadeem. Wadeem is Modon's first residential plots release.

articles.title: LG Unveils Colossal Qned Evo Promising a New Era of Immersive Ai-powered Entertainment
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics is launching a new home entertainment product regionally. This launch represents a significant advancement for the company in the home entertainment market.

articles.title: Perfect Moment Ltd. Announces Closing of Public Offering
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Perfect Moment Ltd. (NYSE American: PMNT), a luxury skiwear and lifestyle brand, is the subject of the news.

articles.title: Robinhood's tokenised stocks spark calls for India to embrace 24/7 blockchain investing
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: Robinhood is rolling out its app in Europe, marking the launch of their service in that region.

articles.title: Mario Kart World's hated change shows Nintendo still doesn't get online games
articles.author: Polygon
articles.summary: Nintendo's upcoming hardware release, the Switch 2, is anticipated. It is the successor of Switch and is expected to further solidify Nintendo's position in the console market.

articles.title: Google to buy 200MW of fusion energy from MIT spinoff CFS
articles.author: Power Technology
articles.summary: Google announced its first commercial product. This launch marks a significant step for Google in offering commercially available products to consumers.

articles.title: New Android phone to be launched tonight ahead of Samsung's unveiling next week
articles.author: Daily Record
articles.summary: Nothing has introduced a new Android phone. The phone is described as unlike anything seen before.

articles.title: Donald Trump Perfume Goes on Sale: Here's What It Smells Like
articles.author: Newsweek
articles.summary: President Donald Trump has launched a new line of fragrances. The product line includes "Fight Fight Fight" for men and "Victory 47" for women.

articles.title: JSW MG Motor India bets big on ‘MG Select' brand of cars
articles.author: Business Line
articles.summary: The company is launching its first product.

articles.title: Nang Robot Launches Rapid Nang Cylinder Delivery Service Across Melbourne
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Nang Robot launched its premium Nang Cylinder Delivery Service, offering high-quality nitrous oxide tanks delivered directly to customers' doors. The service emphasizes speed, safety, and discretion.

articles.title: ‘Donkey Kong Bananza' Is the Switch 2 Launch Game You've Been Waiting For
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Nintendo's Bananza may influence the design of the upcoming Switch 2 console, similar to how Super Mario Odyssey shaped the original Switch.

articles.title: Nothing Headphone 1 launched in India with unique design at ₹21,999: All details
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Nothing, a UK-based smartphone brand, has launched two new products: the Nothing Phone 3 and Headphone 1. The Headphone 1 gained attention for its design and offerings.

articles.title: Hello Bello and Dr. Seuss Enterprises Launch New Collection at Walmart, Bringing Dr. Seuss Babies to Diapering for Families Nationwide
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Hello Bello, a baby care brand, is launching a new collection featuring Dr. Seuss characters. This new line combines playful prints with performance-first diapering features and aims to blend nostalgia with practicality for families.

articles.title: Oppo Pad SE launching in India on July 3 alongside Reno 14 and Reno 14 ...
articles.author: India Today
articles.summary: Oppo is launching the Oppo Pad SE in India in July. The launch will occur alongside the Reno and Reno Pro models.

articles.title: Meghan's ‘essence of sun-drenched outdoor moments' wine sells out in under hour
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: The Duchess's lifestyle brand launched a new rosé wine. The wine is priced at over £65 for a minimum order of three bottles.

articles.title: Scentient Launches Clean Fragrance Subscription for the Conscious Consumer
articles.author: Scentient
articles.summary: Scentient, operated by AKKAYA LLC, launched a clean fragrance subscription box service on July 1, 2025. The service curates non-toxic, cruelty-free perfumes from independent brands, aligning with conscious consumer values. Customers can choose between different subscription models based on scent preferences, with each fragrance vetted by the Scentient team.

articles.title: Scentient Launches Clean Fragrance Subscription for the Conscious Consumer
articles.author: Send2Press
articles.summary: A new service curates perfumes. The perfumes are non-toxic and cruelty-free. The service sources perfumes from artisan brands.
